inclusion.criterion: ESRD with regular dialysis treatment for at least 3 months
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: Her lab results were remarkable for high TSH level (13 mU/L) and low free T4 level (0.2 ng/dl)

inclusion.criterion: stable doses of calcitrol or paricalcitol over the last 30 days
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Congestive heart failure class III or IV
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unstable angina or myocardial infarction or stroke during the previous 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met
not_met
exclusion.evidence: She is still overweight with BMI of 31.

exclusion.criterion: corrected calcemia ≥ 10.5 in the 2 months prior to recruitment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: intake of cholecalciferol or ergocalciferol in the 2 months prior to recruitment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: prospective move to another city or transfer to PD in the following 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but her symptoms improved significantly after starting Levothyroxine per day. Her periods are normal.
